medical_history.chief_complaint: Tall stature and macrodactyly of the great toes.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The proband was treated for long great toes at age 8 by bilateral percutaneous epiphysiodesis. Throughout adolescence, the proband exhibited tall stature and low weight for height. At age 14, her height was 181 cm, with bone age assessed at 13 years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The proband has been diagnosed with fibromyalgia, experiences irregular menses after menarche, and has undergone treatment with oestrogens for height reduction.
medical_history.family_history: Family history unremarkable except for osteoporosis in the proband’s mother and grandmother. The proband’s parents and brother are of normal height.
